name: Ningguang
storytext: The greatest secret she keeps is that she keeps a great many of Liyue's secrets.
source: Reward for inviting Ningguang to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Jade Screen
skills.description: Deals 2 Geo DMG, creates 1 Jade Screen.
